author: Tyler Olson
title: WHO director faces calls for resignation over handling of coronavirus, China
description: Amid persistent criticism that his organization failed to properly oversee China's coronavirus response and worked to downplay the communist nation's responsibility for the pandemic, World Health Organization Director Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus is facing grow…
